com.emitrom.flash4j.starling.client.text

Class BitmapChar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emitrom.flash4j.core.client.ProxyObject
      • com.emitrom.flash4j.starling.client.text.BitmapChar

  • public class BitmapChar
extends ProxyObject
    A BitmapChar contains the information about one char of a bitmap font. You don't have to use this class directly in most cases. The TextField class contains methods that handle bitmap fonts for you.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BitmapChar(int id, Texture texture, double xOffset, double yOffset, double xAdvance) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addKerning(int charID, double amount)
      Adds kerning information relative to a specific other character ID.
      Image createImage()
      Creates an image of the char.
      int getCharID()
      The unicode ID of the char.
      double getHeight()
      The height of the character in points.
      double getKerning()
      Retrieve kerning information relative to the given character ID.
      Texture getTexture()
      The texture of the character.
      double getWidth()
      The width of the character in points.
      double getXAdvance()
      The number of points the cursor has to be moved to the right for the next char.
      double getXOffset()
      The number of points to move the char in x direction on character arrangement.
      double getYOffset()
      The number of points to move the char in y direction on character arrangement.
